entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Order and OrderDescending #67194
  • Spilling can overwrite adjacent stack parameters on ARM64 macOS ABI #67188
    7.0.0
  • Calculate offset directly if possible #67187
  • [API Proposal]: Parameters can be passed in when getting services from IServiceProvider #67185
  • Arm64: Environment.ProcessorCount returns wrong value on higher core machine #67180

Closed

  • Support the generic `Enum` methods in NativeAOT's reflection-free mode. #67191
  • [Crossgen2 / windows / arm64] JIT\Performance\CodeQuality\BenchmarksGame\regex-redux\regex-redux-5 AV's in the CoreCLR runtime #66210
    7.0.0
  • [Crossgen2 composite / windows / x64] Race condition in ZapSig::DecodeModuleFromIndex in random tests #66954
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:6158 with interpreter #54394
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] JIT/IL_Conformance/* tests failed return the correct return code with interpreter #54376
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/div_r8/div_r8.sh failed with unhandled exception with interpreter #54375
    7.0.0
  • dotnet fails to exit with thread stuck in coreclr!WatsonLastChance #66715
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails with a InvalidCastException #67167
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_58827\\Runtime_58827\\Runtime_58827.cmd #66925
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/OSR/tailrecursetry2/tailrecursetry2.sh #66923
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/flowgraph/dev10_bug679008/ehDescriptorPtrUpdate/ehDescriptorPtrUpdate.sh #66920
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
  • Makes GetChildKeys more efficient #67186
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Changing the logic for how we deal with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase matching. #67184
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Refactor JsonSerializer metadata reading infrastructure #67183
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add log to file option to createdump #67181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • [arm64] JIT: Move LowerSIMD to shared lower.cpp #67190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use generic `Enum` methods in more places. #67147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix jit attach hang at Shutdown #67166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • LoggingSourceGenerator - Fixes InvalidCastException when using other attributes #67179
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Obsolete outdated constructors on Rfc2898DeriveBytes #67158
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Updated

  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Improve AOT time by better utilizing the cores #67195
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1683893 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    community-contribution
  • Support binding to immutable types #43662 #67161
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
